text: The Best of The Moody Blues is a 1996 album by English progressive rock band The Moody Blues and went to number 13 in the United Kingdom. It is the first compilation album to feature Go Now featuring original lead singer Denny Laine who was replaced by Justin Hayward shortly after. ==Track listing== All songs written by Justin Hayward except where noted. == References == Category:1996 albums Category:The Moody Blues albums
title: The Best of The Moody Blues
